item.title: about
item.description:
Ladicle

Just here for code? It’s on Github.

I am Software Engineer. I develop cloud services at NTT communications. My interesting things are distributed system, CI, web application architecture.

Contact Me

  • E-mail : ladiclexxx@gmail.com
  • GitHub : https://github.com/Ladicle
  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/Ladicle
